title: Kugel (Jewish noodle pudding)
ingredients: ['1 (225g) package large egg noodles', '85g butter, sliced', '6 eggs, separated', '100g caster sugar', '225g cream cheese, softened', '60g soured cream', '450g cottage cheese, creamed', '1 pinch salt', '55g butter, melted', '50g caster sugar', '30g digestive biscuits, crumbled']
